page.title: 05GALLARD FARM
page.content: THIS IS ONE OF A GROUP OF FARMS OWNED BY MR.PETER ROBESON,THE INTERNATIONAL SHOW JUMPER AND BRITISH EQUESTRIAN OLYMPIC COACH,AWARDED AN O.B.E.THIS YEAR.A FARM MANAGER IS EMPLOYED AND IS RESIDENT AT GALLARD FARM WHICH HAS 140 ACRES.MR.ROBESON LIVES AT FENCES FARM. HIS TWO OTHER FARMS ARE OUT OF THIS 12 KM SQUARE AT RAVENSTONE. GALLARD FARM HAS ONE DAIRY HERD,BLONE D'AQUITAINE, SHEEP- HAMPSHIRE DOWN.MAIN CROPS NOW ARE WHEAT AND PASTURE WITH ONE FIELD OF FORAGE MAIZE.PEAS HAVE NOT BEEN GROWN FOR ABOUT 8 YEARS.GRASS IS CUT FOR SILAGE AND ALL MILK IS SOLD THROUGH THE MILK MARKETING BOARD AND NO SERIOUS REDUCTION IN PRODUCTION HAS RESULTED FROM RECENT E.E.C.REDUCED QUOTAS.A NEW DAIRY UNIT WAS INTRODUCED IN 1978.BOTH FARMS HAVE SEVERAL HORSES (FOR RIDING) AND THESE MIX FREELY WITH THE OTHER ANIMALS IN THE FIELDS.
